forest_entrance.description: You step into the lush forest. Birds chirp in the trees.

items.name: Healing Herb
items.description: A small herb that restores 20 HP when used.

river_bank.description: A gently flowing river blocks your path east. The water looks clear.

items.name: Water Flask
items.description: A flask you can fill at rivers to restore stamina.

river_bridge.description: A fragile wooden bridge spans the river. You hear rustling in the bushes.

deep_forest.description: The forest thickens here. Shadows move between the trees.

abandoned_cabin.description: An old wooden cabin. Broken furniture and cobwebs fill the space.

items.name: Torch
items.description: Can light dark areas or scare some enemies.

items.name: Old Key
items.description: An ancient key. Who knows what it opens?

forest_clearing.description: A sunlit clearing opens before you. The air feels strange.

items.name: Rusty Sword
items.description: An old sword left by another adventurer. Increases attack.

mystic_pond.description: A serene pond glows with magical energy. Something shimmers in the water.

items.name: Mystic Amulet
items.description: A glowing amulet. Seems important for your quest.

sacred_altar.description: An ancient stone altar. A glowing aura fills the room.
